name: Cubit's Adventure - Cube jump game
description:
Navigate Cubit the cube to the finish of these cool and challenging worlds in the shortest time possible without falling or running into traps.

Collect gems and race against time to get the highest score!

Create your own unique platform level and share them with your friends and other players, or play levels made by your friends and other players and give them a score!

Cubit's adventure is only just begun!

Features:
👍 Many cool levels
👍 Time bonus and gems to collect
👍 Traps and challenges

👍 Create cool and challenging levels/worlds and share them with the community
👍 Play levels created by other players and give them a fun factor rating
